body.name: Tree Bookshelf, 8 Shelf Tree Bookcase, Space Saving Storage Rack for CDs/Movies/Books, Book Tree Organizer Shelves for Living Room, Bedroom, Office, Maxi Load 26lbs(/Tier)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 17 mins
features: 【IDEAL FOR EVERY ROOM 】This 8 shelf tree bookshelf stands out in any living room, bedroom, study, office,etc. Its slim profile looks great in an entryway, corner reading nook, bedside, or any small space in need of vertical lift.

【NOT ONLY A BOOKSHELF】This tree bookshelf tower can decorate, accessorize and organize all your treasures: books, magzines, family photos, collections, plants, DVDs and CDs, etc. It is also a great gift for readers, family, bookworms and students, etc.

【STABLE & DURABLE】We've upgraded its base and structure. It is pretty sturdier and heavier than other flimsy cheap tree bookshelves. Moreover, attached a metal anti-falling bracket for offering a safe living environment to family with kids and pets.

【SPACE SAVING & LARGE CAPACITY】Sized 15.9’ x 8.1 x 47.6", this tree bookshelf takes up very little floor space, but hold a lot of items. Each shelf measures 13.4 x 7.5’’(L x W), and can hold 5-10 books depending on the size and thickness of your books of course. Maxi 26lbs(12kg) per shelf.
【EASY TO SETUP】Comes with step by step installation manual and all hardware, this tree bookshelf is quite easy to install. Recommend two people to assemble it.

【PROFESSIONAL CUSTOMER SUPPORT】A prompt response will always be there no matter before or after-sales. Any quality problems, pls contact us, our experienced customer service team will respond in 24 hours ASAP.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fits perfect in any small/narrow space! Aesthetically Pleasing Tree Bookshelf It's is a tall, sleek, brown tree bookcase that stands out in any room and has an abundance of storage space for whatever you please.

8-Shelf Tree bookshelf This eight-tier standing tree bookshelf is a perfect home and office desk accompaniment. It can also be an attracting furniture piece in any living room, bedroom, office, apartment and more. All right angles and the base have reinforced supports for peace of mind, and its compact design makes it suitable for small space, narrow space and corner.
Specifications: Material: Particle Board + Metal Color: Rustic Dark brown Dimensions: 47.6x15.6x8.1"(L x W xH) Weight: 24.3lbs Wall Bracket: Included

Enhanced Sturdy Base Larger and Thicker base + A 90° wood board( for support the structure) + A 90° metal bracket, ensuring its structural solidity and stability. Wall Bracket for Safety 90° Geometric Design Foot pads for floor protection

What is the difference between Himimi tree bookshelf and Other tree bookshelves? Himimi enhanced the total structure with an extra Triangle Board, Thickened and larger base and a Metal Triangle Support Bracket, etc. It is much taller, heavier and sturdier than other tree bookcases! How many books can this tree bookshelf hold? It depends on books' thickness. For thin books, 10-15 books per shelf, for thick books, 3-5books per shelf. In total it might hold 24 to 100books. You can have a try! How long does it take to put together? We've designed a new installation method, making this tree bookshelf easy to put to assemble in 20-30mins. Step by step Installation video is on the way! What is included in the product box? 1 x Tree Bookshelf, 1 x anti-fall bracket, 1 x accessories bag, 1 x Installation Manual Can this book shelf hold large books? Yes, Himimi tree bookshelf has the strength. Each shelf sized 7.5"x13.4"(WxL), which is almost for A4 sized books(8.3"x11.7"(WxL)), while other tree bookshelves can only hold small books.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking and very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf is quite sturdy. I could have put more books on it than shown in my photos. Because the bookshelf is particle board, I was worried it might look cheap and ugly compared to the good mid-century modern furniture I inherited from my mother and grandmother. No problem! In the photo with the bookshelf next to a solid wood end table, you can see that the bookshelf isn’t as high quality, but it doesn’t clash, especially since that end table normally sits several feet away. (The bookshelf is a darker color, but I knew that when I bought it.) Assembly was reasonably easy; the holes were drilled in the correct places to line up well, all of the hardware was included, and the instructions were clear despite being just a series of pictures. The only tool I used was a hand held Phillips screwdriver. It took me 2.5 hours to assemble, but that’s because I'm a total perfectionist. I work VERY slowly with meticulous attention to detail, and consult the instructions frequently. A normal person could probably assemble it in 45 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cool & Super Unique
reviews.reviewText: Lining up books on a normal bookshelf is nice, but putting yours on this unique book tree is even better. I treated myself to this with birthday money and it was a GREAT choice! Easy to put together, sturdy (I have a lot of books!), space on the bottom for reading-themed extras...and it takes up little space in my office but holds 5-6 books a shelf, so with 8 shelves that almost 50 books (depending on size and format). This was a wonderful purchase. This bookworm is thrilled!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy enough to assemble, holding plenty of weight without signs of bowing.
reviews.reviewText: I own two of these - they're easy to assemble. I've had them for about 6 months, and they still seem sturdy. The packing material is good and protects them well in shipping - my boxes were dented but no damage to the materials. The only downside, open the boxes outside if you can - the awesome packing material will dust/flake everywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice unit, quick assembly with power tool
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, nice-looking bookshelf and while it isn't difficult to put together, it is tedious and laborious without an electric screwdriver. Still, well-worth it in the end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional and unique!
reviews.reviewText: Such a unique piece, I absolutely love it! I was on the hunt for something sleek that could hold the few books I still have (kindle lover here!). I didn't want a bookcase, I dislike how clunky and cluttered they tend to look and this seemed like the perfect solution. The instructions were easy to follow and installation was a breeze. I used a power drill but it's definitely doable without it. I don't have it anchored to the wall as of now. I will update review with any changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Bookshelf I neve knew I needed
reviews.reviewText: When I moved into my new apartment I was looking for a bookshelf to go with the rest of my furniture, then this tree-like thing came up as a suggestion. I saw it and thought I gotta have it. Well, now I have it and it works well. It feels fairly sturdy. Mine wobbles a bit, but that's to be expected as there's only one base point and I didn't use the stabilizing hook to attach the backside to the wall. I'd say mine's holding about 20 lbs of books and it's no problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique and useful!
reviews.reviewText: Although it took two hours to assemble, I am quite impressed with end result. The back was harder to assemble for just one. I’m surprised at how many books this will hold. I’m anxious to add more. The base is sturdy. Would definitely buy again and I’ve had many compliments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and space saver!
reviews.reviewText: This has been a very nice addition to my new office that is not as big as my last office. It looks nice, is sturdy and very easy to reach whatever book I need at anytime. I still like books!
No problem putting this together, looks great, sturdy. Nice size for a small condo.
Super étagère. Vraiment très belle. Facile à monter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I like how this looks. I just wish it was made from real wood then it would have been exactly what I wanted

Era da un pò che stavo cercando una libreria di dimensioni compatte per arredare la sala e renderla ordinata. Questa libreria di design mi è sembrata perfetta dalle foto e così è stato.Arrivata perfettamente confezionata, già dal montaggio mi sono subito reso conto che il legno compensato utilizzato era di ottima fattura, nulla a che vedere con i mobili truciolari dell'ikea per intenderci.Il montaggio è facile è veloce (ci ho impiegato 10 minuti al massimo, lavorando da solo) e nel set è presente tutto il necessario per il montaggio.Una volta montata si presenta robusta e molto capiente, grazie alla forma ed il design moderno è possibile inserire all'interno della libreria moltissimi libri grazie ai suoi ben 9 ripiani, posizionati su più livelli.Come elemento d'arredo si adatta bene a qualsiasi ambiente e, per il prezzo a cui viene proposta, è davvero un affare.Personalmente l'ho posizionata all'ingresso della sala, proprio davanti la porta e già molti amici hanno fatto apprezzamenti 😊 per non parlare di mia madre, che era la prima titubante ed invece adesso la adora.Spero che la mia recensione vi sia stata utile e vi abbia aiutato nella scelta dei vostri acquisti 😉Per me questa libreria di grande qualità merita il massimo dei voti

The media could not be loaded. Por mi trabajo siempre necesito estantería para poner libros así que cuando vi ésta..., me pareció una preciosidad que además me encajaba perfectamente en mi salón por el tono estilo wengué. ,Son varios niveles que se van alternando para formar ese estilo tan original y moderno que me encanta.Una vez ya montada y colocada, creo que es un buen momento para opinar sobre si ha estado a la altura de mis expectativas.Paso ahora a detallar los aspectos más positivos y negativos que, de forma objetiva, se pueden considerar tras su compraComo factores positivos: 👍✅ Empaquetado perfecto.✅ Robusta y de fácil montaje (viene con un croquis que te indica paso a paso cómo ir colocando cada tabla)✅ Viene con todas los tornillos y piezas necesarias para su montaje.✅ Altura y espacio más que suficiente para todo tipo de libros (adjunto foto)✅ Elegante y sobria (madera de nogal)✅ Precio muy ajustado a la calidad que presenta.Como factores negativos: 👎⛔ No puedo decir nada negativo porque estoy realmente encantadaEn definitiva, si quieres dar un toque distinto a tu casa más allá de una simple estantería o librería, recomendaría, sin lugar a dudas este estante a cualquier persona que esté buscando un almacenamiento funcional a la vez que elegante.Espero, eso sí, que mi valoración pueda resultar útil a alguien en cuanto al análisis de todos aquellos aspectos que considero relevantes.
